com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder

Class InputState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder.InputState

  • public class InputState
extends java.lang.Object
    A snapshot of all real-time values to be read from an input at a certain time. Especially the set(InputState, int) method is useful to take a snapshot of a configurable set of properties from a given Input

        properties -

      • getPointerCount

        public int getPointerCount()
        Returns the maximum number of pointers that were tracked by this InputState. This should correspond to InputRecorderConfiguration.recordedPointerCount
        Returns:
        the maximum number of pointers stored
